name: Looped Fellas
description:
Game about pointless running in the wheel. Or maybe there is something more?

Imagine the near, dystopian future where advanced AI took control of the world (or were they reptilians?). Man’s role has been reduced to eating his own excrement and spending his whole life as and power supply.

Generation after generation, they devote their lives to a pointless suffering loop, that madness seems to have no end.

Welcome on board, make yourself comfortable and have fun!

Short How To Play

To make wheel spin faster, click on your character when he is over lighter (cyan like color) part of the wheel. This is a part of game which should be obvious, but might not be. The rest is up to you guys, happy, and boring, running is waiting!

Ok, maybe also stats:

  1. Strength/Endurance - determines how fast you run out from energy
  2. Speed - determines how fast can you go (be careful, the faster you are, the more energy you use)
  3. Resistance - reduces damage from various sources - falling, lighting etc.

Apart from the fact that it may not be obvious at the beginning, the game even has two different endings. :D

===============================================================

This is my entry for Compo,  Ludum Dare 47. The topic was Stuck in a loop.
All elements of the game were prepared within 48 hours.
